title: 1. Lobby & Hallway Cleaning
desc: Keep lobbies and hallways clean, polished, and welcoming for residents and visitors. Regular cleaning ensures a safe and hygienic environment for everyone.

title: 2. Elevator & Stairwell Cleaning
desc: Sanitize elevators and stairwells to maintain cleanliness and safety throughout the building. High-traffic areas are cleaned regularly for optimal hygiene.

title: 3. Window & Glass Cleaning
desc: Spotless windows and glass doors brighten common areas and improve the overall appearance of the building. Regular cleaning prevents dust and streak buildup.

title: 4. Trash & Common Area Maintenance
desc: Regular trash removal and upkeep of shared spaces keep the building hygienic and safe. Our team ensures all common areas are tidy and presentable daily.

title: 5. Floor & Surface Cleaning
desc: Thorough cleaning of floors, surfaces, and high-touch areas maintains a healthy environment. Polished floors and sanitized surfaces make a great impression.
